title: Intermediate Financial Accounting Practice Training Using Visual Demonstrations

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of basic accounting principles and financial statement interpretation
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric constrained technological environments, aiming to enhance job application capabilities for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can reproduce financial statement analysis procedures through visual demonstrations with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can explain the key points of accounting processing cases in a logical flow of three or more steps.
Learners can demonstrate decision-making skills using accounting information through project evaluations based on real-world business cases.

resources: Smart device compatible with document camera or screen sharing
Accounting case studies and practical templates
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
